name: Text + sub text list
description: Serves as the default layout for a simple, two-line text list. Use this for a standard enumeration of items where order or priority is not critical. Each item consists of a main subject and supplementary sub-text.
examples: Summarize the important messages I received this week.
What were the key takeaways from the meeting?
List the pros and cons of electric cars.

component_title.description: A brief title for the entire list (e.g., 'Meeting Summary', 'Recent Messages').

text_list.description: An array of text-based items to be displayed in the list. Recommended 1-5 items.

list_subject.description: The primary text or subject line for the list item. (Note: Text may be truncated with '...' if it exceeds display limits).

list_content.description: The secondary or supplementary text that provides more detail for the list item.

html:
{{ data.component_title }}

{{ item.list_subject }}

{{ item.list_content }}
